A. I start from a high-rise building, descend to street level, and move along the street to my current location.  
B. I start from the park, rise to a high altitude, then descend to street level, and move to my current location.  
C. I take off from the top of a high-rise building, descend, and move to my current location, which is in front of a shop with a red "安个家" sign.  
D. I move from the height of the high-rise roof to right outside the edge of the roof, descend to the height of the tree crown on the ground, turn left to face the store at the bottom of the building, and then move left.  
E. I start from a random location, fly directly to the store, and land.

This sequence indicates a direct path from an elevated position to the targeted store.
